author: Shawna Chen
title: U.S. to sanction Putin, Lavrov as Russia continues to barrel down on Ukraine
description: The Russian president is the U.S.'s most high-profile target yet.
content:
The U.S. will impose sanctions on Russian President Vladimir Putin and Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov, White House press secretary Jen Psaki announced on Friday.
